scripts.compile: yarn compile-vydrach && yarn compile-yautja && yarn compile-yautja-server
scripts.compile-vydrach: mv node_modules staging && cd staging/vydrach && yarn && yarn compile && yarn compile-web && yarn download-builtin-extensions && cd ../.. && mv staging node_modules
scripts.compile-yautja: mv node_modules staging && cd staging/yautja && yarn && yarn compile && cd ../.. && mv staging node_modules
